name: salmonberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small red fruit that looks similar to a raspberry and grows wild on bushes in North America: He enjoyed picking salmonberries in the spring time and blackberries in the summer time.
More examplesFewer examplesI left my bike by the side of the road and entered a tangled thicket of salmonberry bushes.Garnish the dessert with more dates, dark chocolate curls, and salmonberries.Soon blueberries, cranberries, salmonberries, blackberries and rosehips will suddenly be available by the bucket-load.
